Text:
If you find watching paint dry this is the film for you.
I would have found sticking pins in my eyes more entertaining.

A true classic. 

Action, suspense,chase scenes. A zero violence shown... it took a master director and screen writer to pull off this masterpiece.

on the intellectual/artsy side, so yes, van diesel or 'charlies angels' fans like the the other turd reviewer will have to slip this one
